fullName.value: Mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase kinase kinase 4

texts.value: Serine/threonine kinase that may play a role in the response to environmental stress and cytokines such as TNF-alpha. Appears to act upstream of the JUN N-terminal pathway. Phosphorylates SMAD1 on Thr-322

Interacts with the SH3 domain of the adapter proteins Nck (By similarity). Interacts (via its CNH regulatory domain) with ATL1 (via the N-terminal region). Interacts with RAP2A (GTP-bound form preferentially)
Widely expressed. Isoform 5 is abundant in the brain. Isoform 4 is predominant in the liver, skeletal muscle and placenta
Belongs to the protein kinase superfamily. STE Ser/Thr protein kinase family. STE20 subfamily
